H0.text: What is an orthodox Mahommedan sect whose name derives from a body of traditional teaching which has equal authority with the Koran. Hanafi

H1.text: What is an orthodox Mahommedan sect whose name derives from a body of traditional teaching which has equal authority with the Koran. Maliki

H2.text: What is an orthodox Mahommedan sect whose name derives from a body of traditional teaching which has equal authority with the Koran. Shafi'i

H3.text: What is an orthodox Mahommedan sect whose name derives from a body of traditional teaching which has equal authority with the Koran. Sunni

A4.text: the Arabic term sunna, which Sunnis are named after, dates back to pre-Islamic language

A5.text: the Quran, together with hadith... form the basis of all traditional jurisprudence within Sunni Islam
